data.text: Masigi matungda eina yengbada eigi mangda swargada thong ama hangdoktuna leiba ure. Aduga eina hanna takhiba khonjel aduna peresinggagi khonjelgumna eingonda hairak-i, “Maphamsida ka-khatlak-u, aduga masigi matungda kari thokkadage haiba adu eina nangonda uhange.”
Khudak aduda ei thawaida leirammi aduga eigi maangda swargada phambal amada kanagumba ama phamduna leirammi.
Mahakki maithong adu mamal yamlaba nung jasper amasung carneliangi masek mangalgummi, aduga emerald machugi chumthangna phambal adu koisilli.
Phambal adugi akoibada atei phambal kunmarina koisilli, aduga maduda angouba phijol setpa makokta sanagi luhup uppa ahal-laman kunmari phamlammi.

4:5 Khong 19:16; Phong 8:5; 11:19; 16:18; Eze 1:13; Phong 1:4; Zec 4:2Phambal adudagi nongthang kuppagi khangal nganba mangalsing, nong khakpagi amadi nong khongbagi ahouba makhol thoraklammi. Phambal adugi mamangda meira taret chaklammi. Makhoising adu Tengban Mapugi thawai taretni.
4:6,7 Eze 1:22; Eze 1:5-10; 10:14Phambal adugi mangda liklaigumna langba likligi samudragumba ama leirammi.
Ahanba thawaipanba adu nongsa malli, anisuba aduna sal laba malli, ahumsuba aduna mioibagi saktam manba mamai palli aduga marisuba aduna apaiba eagle malli.

4:8 Eze 1:18; 10:12; Isa 6:2,3Thawaipanba marimak masa taruk taruk palli aduga masasing adugi manungsu mapansu mamitna pumthan thalli. Amasung ahing nungthil animakta makhoina keidounungda isei sakpa lepte:
Thawaipanba mari aduna phambal adugi mathakta phamliba lomba naidana hingliba Ibungo adugi matik mangalgi, ikai khumnabagi amadi thagatpagi isei saklammi. Amasung makhoina asumna touba matamda,

Ahal laman kunmari aduna phambaldugi mathakta phamliba Ibungo mahakki maangda tuthajaduna lomba naidana hingliba Ibungo mahakpu khurumjarammi. Makhoigi luhupsing adu phambaldugi mangda louthoktuna thamjaraga hai,
